Supreme Ironclad XPAC1 10Q Science Unit - Construct Titan B 12/12 2 The first attack each turn does not exert this card. May only attack a Quanta Lord once per turn. Can attack any card type. When it attacks a non-unit card, destroy it. {Flash} Destroy a friendly relic: Give this card {Shroud} or {Aura} for the turn.
As far as the world is concerned, this is the first Ironclad. Steamlined for battle, armies have surrendered to avoid its wrath.
Master of Lords XPAC1 4Q Outsider Unit - Warlock B 2/2 2 When an enemy Quanta Lord's effect is activated, gain +5/+5 and an ability.
A middling creature, easily dispatched by its superiors. It survives by thriving on their very overconfidence.

The humble priest, a scholar of virtuous healing and brutal sacrifice.
Tiny Sickle XPAC1 2Q Nature Science Unit - Insect Soldier GR 1/1 2 If you summon this card by evolving, it gains [Toxic] and [Swift]. {Evolve} Gain +2/+1.
There is no lasting hierarchy among the Verol; there is only the moment's duty. Even the lowest of the low won't hesitate.
Seventh Son XPAC1 6Q Mythical Nature Science Unit - Insect GR 4/5 2 {Summon} Attach 2 cards in your graveyard to this card. While material, you can detach this card: Shuffle it into your deck.
The flow of many bloodlines converges within this one, what will they do with such power?
String Gunner XPAC1 5Q Nature Science Unit - Insect Soldier GR 3/5 2 {Flash} Exert a relic and this card: Stun a card. {Evolve} Gain "{Battle} The opposing unit gets -3/0."
Specializing in capturing enemies alive with its ordnance, this arachnid is a skilled tactician.
Dancing Scythe XPAC1 6Q Nature Science Unit - Insect Soldier GR 6/2 2 {Battle} If this would kill, gain [Invulnerable]. {Upkeep} Lose [Invulnerable]. {Evolve} Gain +6/-2
Leap after leap, they never stop moving, not until the last foe is felled.
Symbiotic Orthrozanclus XPAC1 4Q Nature Science Unit - Insect Fish GR 0/1 2 {Evolve} Base toughness becomes 10. Gain the following ability... "{Flash} Give or remove [Guard] from this card."
Some early Verol evolved to bolster their allies directly. The subfaction persists to this day.
